en: I will sing of the lovingkindness of Jehovah for ever: With my mouth will I make known thy faithfulness to all generations.
hmr: LALPA ngilneina thuhai chu kumkhuoin hlaah sak ka ta, Ka bauin, i ringumzie chu suon po po chenin inhriettir ka tih.

en: For I have said, Mercy shall be built up for ever; Thy faithfulness wilt thou establish in the very heavens.
hmr: “Ngilneina chu kumkhuoa dingin remin um a ta, I ringumna chu vânahai ngei khin sukdet i tih,” ka ti tah a nih.

en: I have made a covenant with my chosen, I have sworn unto David my servant:
hmr: Nang chun i hril ta sih a; Ka mi thlang kuoma chun thu ka thlung a, Ka siehlaw David kuoma chun ṭawng kân khâm tah a,

en: Thy seed will I establish for ever, And build up thy throne to all generations. [Selah
hmr: “I thlahai chu kumkhuoha dingin sukdet ka ta, I lalṭhungpha khawm suon po po chenin inngîr zing ka tih,” tiin.

en: And the heavens shall praise thy wonders, O Jehovah; Thy faithfulness also in the assembly of the holy ones.
hmr: Aw LALPA, vânhai khin i thilmak thawhai hi inpâk an ta, Mi inthienghai inkhâwmnaa khin i ringumna hi inpâk bawk an tih.

en: For who in the skies can be compared unto Jehovah? Who among the sons of the mighty is like unto Jehovah,
hmr: Vân dumhaia khin LALPA le hrilkhi thei ding tu am an um leh? Mi thilthawtheitak nauhai lai khin LALPA ang,

en: A God very terrible in the council of the holy ones, And to be feared above all them that are round about him?
hmr: Mi inthienghai inrâwn khâwmnaa Pathien ṭiumtak, A kâwlvêla mi po po nêka ṭitak ding chu tu am a um leh?

en: O Jehovah God of hosts, Who is a mighty one, like unto thee, O Jehovah? And thy faithfulness is round about thee.
hmr: Aw LALPA sipaihai Pathien, Aw JAH, nang anga mi hrât tu am an um a? I ringumna chu i vêlah a um sih a,

en: Thou rulest the pride of the sea: When the waves thereof arise, thou stillest them.
hmr: Nang chun tuisuoriet chapona chungah ro i rêl hlak a, A tuifâwn invawr laihai chu i sukre hlak.

en: Thou hast broken Rahab in pieces, as one that is slain; Thou hast scattered thine enemies with the arm of thy strength.
hmr: Nang chun Rahab chu râl that angin i sukkawi dar vawng a, Nangma dotuhai chu i bân thahrâtin i sukdar ta vawng a.

en: The heavens are thine, the earth also is thine: The world and the fulness thereof, thou hast founded them.
hmr: Vânhai khi nanga ta a na, hnuoi khawm hi nanga ta a nih. Khawvêl le a sûnga thil um po po hi nangma inngîr a nih.

en: The north and the south, thou hast created them: Tabor and Hermon rejoice in thy name.
hmr: Sim le hmâr chu nanga siem a na, Tabor le Hermon chun i hming leiin hlimin hla an sak hlak.

en: Thou hast a mighty arm; Strong is thy hand, and high is thy right hand.
hmr: Nang chun bân thilthawtheitak i nei a, I kut chu a hrât a, i kut changtieng chu chawimawiin a um a.

en: Righteousness and justice are the foundation of thy throne: Lovingkindness and truth go before thy face.
hmr: Felna le rorêlna fel chu i lalṭhungpha innghatna a na, Ngilneina le thutak chu i hmaah an fe hlak,

en: Blessed is the people that know the joyful sound: They walk, O Jehovah, in the light of thy countenance.
hmr: Ri hlimum hre hlak hnam chu an hamṭha ie, Aw LALPA, anni chu i hmêl varah an um hlak,

en: In thy name do they rejoice all the day; And in thy righteousness are they exalted.
hmr: I hming leiin sûnnithlâkin an hlim hlak a, I felna leiin chawimawiin an um hlak.

en: For thou art the glory of their strength; And in thy favor our horn shall be exalted.
hmr: Nang chu an hrâtna ropuina i ni sih a, I ditsakna leiin kan ki hi chawimawiin um a tih.

en: For our shield belongeth unto Jehovah; And our king to the Holy One of Israel.
hmr: Kan phaw hi LALPA ta a ni sih a, Kan lal hi Israelhai Mi Inthieng ta a nih.

en: Then thou spakest in vision to thy saints, And saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.
hmr: Chuong lai chun i mi inthienghai kuomah inlârnaah thu i hril a, “Mi pakhat hrâttak chunga chun ṭhangpuina kân nghat a, Mi pakhat, mihai laia inthawka thlang suok chu ka chawimawi tah a.

en: I have found David my servant; With my holy oil have I anointed him:
hmr: Ka siehlaw David chu ka hmusuok a, Ka hriek inthieng chun ama chu ka nâl tah a.

en: With whom my hand shall be established; Mine arm also shall strengthen him.
hmr: Ka kut hi a kuomah sukdetin um a ta, Ka bân hin ama chu sukhrât a tih.

en: The enemy shall not exact from him, Nor the son of wickedness afflict him.
hmr: Dotu chun ama chu hnesie ngai naw nih a, Rîtlona nau khawmin ama sukrinum naw nih.

en: And I will beat down his adversaries before him, And smite them that hate him.
hmr: Ama dotuhai chu a hmaah vaw thlûng ka ta, Ama theidatuhai chu sawisâng ka tih.

en: But my faithfulness and my lovingkindness shall be with him; And in my name shall his horn be exalted.
hmr: Ama kuoma ruok chun ka ngilneina le ka ringumna chu um a ta, Ka hming leiin a ki chu chawimawiin um bawk a tih.

en: I will set his hand also on the sea, And his right hand on the rivers.
hmr: A kut chu tuisuorieta chun innghattir ka ta, A kut changtieng chu vadungpuia hai chun.

en: He shall cry unto me, Thou art my Father, My God, and the rock of my salvation.
hmr: Ama chun, ‘Nang chu ka pa, Ka Pathien, ka insandamna lungpui i nih,’ tiin mi ko a tih.

en: I also will make him my first-born, The highest of the kings of the earth.
hmr: Chun, keiin ama chu nau lutîrah siem ka ta, Hnuoia lalhai lai chun a chunghnungtakah siem ka tih.

en: My lovingkindness will I keep for him for evermore; And my covenant shall stand fast with him.
hmr: Ka zainêmna chu kumkhuoin a ta dingin kawl ṭhapêk ka ta, Ka thuthlung chu a kuomah um det a tih.

en: His seed also will I make to endure for ever, And his throne as the days of heaven.
hmr: A chi thlahai chu kumkhuoin inumtir ka ta, A lalṭhungpha khawm chu vân um sûng ni chenin inumtir bawk ka tih.

en: If his children forsake my law, And walk not in mine ordinances;
hmr: A nauhai chun ka dân hi an nghatsan a, Ka rorêlnahai anga an um nawh a,

en: If they break my statutes, And keep not my commandments;
hmr: Ka thuruot an bawsiet a, Ka thupêk an kawl ṭha naw chun;

en: Then will I visit their transgression with the rod, And their iniquity with stripes.
hmr: An bawsietnahai chu hmawl leh hung kan ka ta, An rîtlonahai chu vuokin hung kan ka tih.

en: But my lovingkindness will I not utterly take from him, Nor suffer my faithfulness to fail.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, ka ngilneina chu a kuoma inthawk chun lâkpêk vawng naw ning a, Ka ringumna chu khêla ân chang phal bawk naw ning.

en: My covenant will I not break, Nor alter the thing that is gone out of my lips.
hmr: Ka thuthlung chu bawse naw ning a, Ka hmûra thu suok chu sukdanglam bawk naw ning.

en: Once have I sworn by my holiness: I will not lie unto David:
hmr: Vawi khat ka inthiengna sâlin kân khâm a, David kuomah khêl hril naw ningah.

en: His seed shall endure for ever, And his throne as the sun before me.
hmr: A chithlahai chu kumkhuoin um an ta, A lalṭhungpha chu ka hmaah nisa angin um bawk a tih.

en: It shall be established for ever as the moon, And as the faithful witness in the sky. [Selah
hmr: Thla angin kumkhuoa dingin sukdetin um a ta, Vân duma hretu ringum ang khin,” i tih a.

en: But thou hast cast off and rejected, Thou hast been wroth with thine anointed.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, nang chun i thlauthlâkin i dit nawh a, I hrieknâl chunga chun i lung a sen tah a.

en: Thou hast abhorred the covenant of thy servant: Thou hast profaned his crown by casting it to the ground.
hmr: I siehlaw thuthlung chu i tirdak a, A lallukhum chu hnuoia peithla hielin i suktlâwm tah a.

en: Thou hast broken down all his hedges; Thou hast brought his strongholds to ruin.
hmr: A dâi po po chu i sukthlûk a, A kulbînghai chu i suksiet tah a.

en: All that pass by the way rob him: He is become a reproach to his neighbors.
hmr: Lampuia fe poin a thil an lâkpêk hlak a, A vêla mihai hrilsietin a hung um tah a.

en: Thou hast exalted the right hand of his adversaries; Thou hast made all his enemies to rejoice.
hmr: Ama dotuhai kut changtieng chu i chawimawi a, A hmêlmahai po po chu i sukhlim tah a.

en: Yea, thou turnest back the edge of his sword, And hast not made him to stand in the battle.
hmr: Anih, a kâwlhnâm hmawrzum chu i namkâwi a, Ama chu inthawnaa chun în ngîrdettir ta nawh a.

en: Thou hast made his brightness to cease, And cast his throne down to the ground.
hmr: A ropuina chu i suktâwp a, A lalṭhungpha chu hnuoiah i pei thlâk tah a.

en: The days of his youth hast thou shortened: Thou hast covered him with shame. [Selah
hmr: A tlangvâl lai nihai chu i suktâwipêk a, Ama chu muolphonain în khum ta sih a.

en: How long, O Jehovah? wilt thou hide thyself for ever? How long shall thy wrath burn like fire?
hmr: Aw LALPA, ieng chen am în bihmang kumkhuo ding a na? Ieng chen am i lunginsen chu mei anga a chawk ding a na?

en: Oh remember how short my time is: For what vanity hast thou created all the children of men!
hmr: Aw, ka hun hi a tâwi dingzie hre zing la, Mihriem nauhai po po hi i va siem teplo ngei de!

en: What man is he that shall live and not see death, That shall deliver his soul from the power of Sheol? [Selah
hmr: Ieng mi am thi ni hmêl hmu loa hringa, Seol kuta inthawka hringna sanhim ding chu?

en: Lord, where are thy former lovingkindnesses, Which thou swarest unto David in thy faithfulness?
hmr: LALPA, tienlaia i lunginsiet- na, i ringumnaa David kuoma inkhâma i tiem kha, Khâwlai am a um tah a?

en: Remember, Lord, the reproach of thy servants; How I do bear in my bosom the reproach of all the mighty peoples,
hmr: LALPA, i siehlawhai an hrilsietna chu hre zing la, Hnam hrâttakhai po po hrilsietna ka ângsûnga ka tuor hlakzie hi.

en: Wherewith thine enemies have reproached, O Jehovah, Wherewith they have reproached the footsteps of thine anointed.
hmr: Aw LALPA, nangma dotuhai hrilsietna, I hrieknâl kehnunghai an hrilsietna chu.

en: Blessed be Jehovah for evermore. Amen, and Amen.
hmr: LALPA chu kumkhuoin inpâkin um raw se. Amen, Amen.
